verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David בִּהְיוֹת֖וֹ <S%H1961><s%> was in בַמְּעָרָ֣ה <S%H4631><s%> when he was in the cave תְפִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8605><s%> A Prayer ק֭וֹלִי <S%H6963><s%> with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶזְעָ֑ק <S%H2199><s%> I cried ק֝וֹלִ֗י <S%H6963><s%> with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <S%H2603><s%> did I make my supplication

אֶשְׁפֹּ֣ךְ <S%H8210><s%> I poured out לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> before שִׂיחִ֑י <S%H7879><s%> my complaint צָ֝רָתִ֗י <S%H6869><s%> him my trouble לְפָנָ֥יו <S%H6440><s%> before אַגִּֽיד׃ <S%H5046><s%> him I shewed

בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֬ף <S%H5848><s%> was overwhelmed עָלַ֨י ׀ <S%H5921><s%> within רוּחִ֗י <S%H7307><s%> When my spirit וְאַתָּה֮ <S%H859><s%> You יָדַ֪עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> within me then thou knewest נְֽתִיבָ֫תִ֥י <S%H5410><s%> my path בְּאֹֽרַח־ <S%H734><s%> In the way ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> wherein אֲהַלֵּ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> I walked טָמְנ֖וּ <S%H2934><s%> have they privily laid פַ֣ח <S%H6341><s%> a snare לִֽי׃

הַבֵּ֤יט <S%H5027><s%> I looked יָמִ֨ין ׀ <S%H3225><s%> on [my] right hand וּרְאֵה֮ <S%H7200><s%> and beheld וְאֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there לִ֪י מַ֫כִּ֥יר <S%H5234><s%> but [there was] no man that would know אָבַ֣ד <S%H6><s%> failed מָנ֣וֹס <S%H4498><s%> me refuge מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> is no דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> me no man cared לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> for my soul

זָעַ֥קְתִּי <S%H2199><s%> I cried אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> to יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee O LORD אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You מַחְסִ֑י <S%H4268><s%> Thou [art] my refuge חֶ֝לְקִ֗י <S%H2506><s%> [and] my portion בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הַֽחַיִּים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה ׀ <S%H7181><s%> Attend אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to רִנָּתִי֮ <S%H7440><s%> unto my cry כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For דַלּ֪וֹתִ֫י <S%H1809><s%> low מְאֹ֥ד <S%H3966><s%> very הַצִּילֵ֥נִי <S%H5337><s%> deliver מֵרֹדְפַ֑י <S%H7291><s%> me from my persecutors כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמְצ֣וּ <S%H553><s%> for they are stronger מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> are too

ה֘וֹצִ֤יאָה <S%H3318><s%> Bring מִמַּסְגֵּ֨ר ׀ <S%H4525><s%> out of prison נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> my soul לְהוֹד֪וֹת <S%H3034><s%> that I may praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁ֫מֶ֥ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thy name בִּ֭י יַכְתִּ֣רוּ <S%H3803><s%> shall compass me about צַדִּיקִ֑ים <S%H6662><s%> the righteous כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for תִגְמֹ֣ל <S%H1580><s%> for thou shalt deal bountifully עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and
